name: Marr Labs
headline: AI-voice agents that are indistinguishable from humans.
description:
Marr Labs is making AI-voice agents that are indistinguishable from humans. Han and Dave previously created speech tech company Vlingo that powered the first Siri app and was acquired for $225M. 

Now they are taking voice to the next level by making AI-voice agents that can handle virtually any phone-based job, from answering calls to schedule appointments to call center sales and support jobs—all at a fraction of the cost of a human agent.

In the US alone, businesses handle 17 billion calls a year at an average cost of $5 per call–an $85 billion addressable market.

founders.name: Dave Grannan, Founder
founders.description: Dave is the co-founder and CEO of Marr Labs. Previously, Dave was the founding CEO of speech recognition company Vlingo that provided speech recognition for the first Siri products and was acquired for $225M by Nuance Communications. Dave was also Chairman of the Board of NLP and speech recognition company Maluuba that was acquired for $160M by Microsoft. Prior to founding Marr, Dave was co-founder and CEO of machine vision company Light, acquired by John Deere.

founders.name: Han Shu, Founder
founders.description: Han is the co-founder & CTO of Marr Labs, an AI/ML pioneer and 2X entrepreneur. As co-founder of Vlingo(acquired by Nuance for $225M), he built Speech Recognition & Natural Language Understanding stacks, and supplied ASR to Siri. As co-founder of Wyth(acquired by Airbnb), he developed mobile personal assistant technology for collaborative productivity applications. Han led the ML and AI groups at both Airbnb and DoorDash. Han holds PhD, MEng, and BS degrees from MIT, and 25 patents.

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/485499a5-880b-429e-8615-eb32e536fcb3/robbajohr_abstract_sound_waves_that_symbolize_hightech_and_AI_c712a932-e95c-4dd7-b7d4-49eebafb0025_0.png)
# Introducing Vox, an AI-voice agent indistinguishable from a human
**Vox is a force multiplier for sales, support and you.**
Out of the box, Vox just works. This frees up your workforce to focus on critical issues. With Vox’s 24/7 conversational intelligence, your team can close more business and handle more customer service issues with a human touch.
[ Watch demo ](https://www.marrlabs.com/<#demo>)
[ Talk to the team ](https://www.marrlabs.com/</home/#contact-form>)
![Vox](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/c5dd79f8-9994-429d-8053-f9f893a1dbb9/vox-eyebrow.png)
# Built for Mortgage Lenders
Vox accelerates lead conversion, streamlines pre-qualification, and integrates seamlessly with your systems.
In the competitive mortgage industry, speed is everything. Vox is a custom-built AI voice agent that ensures your online leads are contacted within milliseconds. It provides a human-like experience while pre-qualifying borrowers and transferring them to your loan officers, all within seconds.
[ Learn more ](https://www.marrlabs.com/</use-cases/mortgage>)
Reach prospects by phone within milliseconds
Human-like chat keeps prospects engaged until the loan officer is reached
Warm transfer reduces abandoned calls and increases lead conversion
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/a7394b90-0bf1-45e8-b175-58b41be96a66/Frame+7.png)
**Scheduler**
Calendar meetings, demos, pitches and appointments — inbound or outbound.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/02611be9-a8dd-4fdb-b04b-ba7b759c46a7/Frame+8.png)
**Lead pre-qualification**
Breeze through qualification of tens of thousands of leads in a snap.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/c23700d4-06c8-4d49-8ba7-29358163a653/Frame+4.png)
**Data acquisition**
Enrich your customer data set to enhance experiences and streamline business.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/d9dc9acc-c3d9-4ab2-85d9-d088e6d1435e/Frame+8-1.png)
**Sales agent**
Warm up and close more business than you ever thought possible.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/cfbd490e-1f9e-4bb3-9bb7-a78dd30d84e0/Frame+8-2.png)
**Customer service agent**
Delight your customers with 24/7 support at a human level.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/8848146d-6d2e-4be6-a5c0-8f3862d4d353/Frame+8-3.png)
**Personal assistant**
Take back your time: Vox can screen your calls, make appointments, and manage your household calendar.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/b2c9906b-38e2-46d5-835f-c17b2fdec3a5/symphonia-circles.png)
## The future of conversational AI is here today because of Symphonia. 
Symphonia is Marr Labs' proprietary conversational intelligence platform that powers the Vox voice agent. Symphonia delivers hardened, failsafe capabilities so the Vox agent can learn your business, deploy its skillset, and navigate conversations seamlessly.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/9beb93fd-3cb9-4e70-b8eb-bfc9e1b2b86b/ml-turbo.png)
**ML Turbo**
ML Turbo is the heart of Vox's conversational intelligence. They say listening is more important than speaking. ML Turbo provides unparalleled sophistication in listening so that back-and-forth conversation is rendered in the most natural way without delay.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/03acb29e-43af-425e-99df-202da29ff366/ml-reason.png)
**ML Reason**
If ML Turbo is the heart, ML Reason is the brain. ML Reason is a highly customized Large Language Model that allows Vox to immerse itself in your knowledge base and quickly become an expert. ML Reason also provides the basis for giving the Vox agent skill-based specializations - like having an instant PhD in Sales, Support and Scheduling.
## Meet the Marr Labs Team
Marr Labs is built on a foundation of deep expertise and collaboration. The founders, who pioneered the technology behind Siri and Samsung’s S-Voice, have reunited with key leaders across engineering, product, sales, and marketing to redefine conversational AI. With a proven track record of innovation and building companies, the team is uniquely positioned to bring transformative AI solutions to market. 
[ Explore their stories ](https://www.marrlabs.com/</team>)
Proven track record of innovation.
Unmatched expertise in AI and conversational technology. 
Exceptional operational and product execution.
## Schedule a demo of Vox with the Marr Labs team.
Discover how our custom-built AI-Voice solutions can transform your operations and elevate customer interactions with a live demo. With our team, you'll experience firsthand how seamless scheduling, lead pre-qualification, and customer support can be when powered by intelligent automation.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/652ab12dd2baee2c608d1086/37d0ac5c-5f9f-4d1a-9229-9107c1fb2064/Marr-Labs-logo.png)
[**hello@marrlabs.com**](https://www.marrlabs.com/<http:/squarespace.com>)© Marr Labs 2024

generated_description:
**Marr Labs: Redefining AI Voice Interactions**

Founded in 2023, Marr Labs is on a mission to create AI voice agents so human-like they’re practically indistinguishable from a real person. This San Francisco-based startup, part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, is spearheaded by Han and Dave, the visionary team behind Vlingo, the technology that powered the first Siri app—acquired for a cool $225 million. They've taken their deep expertise in speech technology and turned their sights on transforming voice interactions in business.

### What They Do

At the core of Marr Labs’ offering is **Vox**, an AI voice agent designed to manage a wide range of phone-based tasks. From answering customer calls and scheduling appointments to handling sales and customer service inquiries, Vox can do it all at a fraction of the cost of human agents. This system taps into a massive opportunity: businesses in the U.S. handle around **17 billion calls** annually, costing an average of **$5 per call**, which translates into an **$85 billion** market. That's a big pie, and Marr Labs aims to grab a generously sized slice.

### What Makes Vox Special?

Vox is equipped with **Symphonia**, Marr Labs' proprietary conversational intelligence platform. Symphonia enhances Vox’s capabilities, enabling it to learn and adapt to specific business needs. Think of it as Vox's brain, embedded with advanced features like **ML Turbo** and **ML Reason**—the very components that allow Vox to converse naturally while essentially holding an “instant PhD” in Sales, Support, and Scheduling.

### Target Industries

Initially focusing on the **mortgage sector**, where speed and responsiveness can be the difference between landing a deal or losing it to competitors, Vox promises to accelerate lead conversions and streamline processes with its human-like interactions.

But Marr Labs isn't stopping there. They're also eyeing the **healthcare sector**, hinting at future applications that could further push the boundaries of conversational AI.

### The Team Behind the Magic

Marr Labs edges ahead not just because of technology but also thanks to its powerhouse team that boasts a rich background in AI and conversational tech. This collaboration is pivotal for driving operational excellence and innovative product execution.

### Why It Matters

In a world overwhelmed with digital interactions, Marr Labs is pioneering a significant shift in how businesses engage with customers. By effectively melding AI with human-like interaction, they're not just enhancing operational efficiency but also reshaping customer experiences.

If you’re intrigued by how Marr Labs can elevate your operations and customer communication, **[check out their website](https://www.marrlabs.com/)** and consider scheduling a demo to see Vox in action. After all, who wouldn’t want to experience the future of conversational AI today?
